        green - green channel (0 to 255)
        blue - blue channel (0 to 255)

        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the square
        y - the y coordinate of the square
        fileName - the name of the image file. Null removes the image file.

        Returns:

      • gb_addSprite

        public void gb_addSprite(int id,
                         java.lang.String spriteFileName,
                         boolean top)
        Adds a new sprite to the board.
        Parameters:
        id - a unique id to identify the sprite
        spriteFileName - The file name of the image for the sprite
        top - if true, the sprite will be drawn on top of all previous ones. If false, it will be drawn at the bottom
